pages.text: A $(item)Bloomery$() consumes fuel to smelt ore into $(item)Blooms$().$(p)$(info) The more fuel a $(item)Bloomery$() has, the faster it will operate.$(p)$(info) The fuel's burn time also affects the $(item)Bloomery's$() speed.$(p)$(info) A $(item)Bellows$() or $(item)Mechanical Bellows$() can accelerate a $(item)Bloomery$().

To use, place ore and fuel in the top of the $(item)Bloomery$(), then ignite the top with a $(l:appendix/ignition)verified fire-starting device$().$(p)When the fire on top goes out, you can remove the $(item)Ash$() and $(item)Bloom$().$(p)$(info) To remove $(item)Ash$(), $(use) the top of the $(item)Bloomery$() with a shovel.$(p)$(warning) Remember, $(item)Blooms$() are hot - handling them can be dangerous.
Some fuel is more efficient when used in a $(item)Bloomery$().
